_template_info.use_for: Single video shot/scene with Emily-quality specifications
_template_info.author: BMAD JSON Prompt Generator

scene_description.environment: CHANGE_ME Dark cave interior with fire flickering on rough stone walls, primitive tools scattered on ground
scene_description.weather_atmosphere: CHANGE_ME Smoky from fire, humid cave air, musty ancient smell
scene_description.sensory_details: CHANGE_ME Rhythmic chiseling sound, fire crackling, stone dust in air

subject_and_action.identity: CHANGE_ME Ancient human adult male, weathered appearance
subject_and_action.body_visible: CHANGE_ME Hands and forearms only, torso in shadow
subject_and_action.action: CHANGE_ME Chiseling stone into tool shape with primitive hammer
subject_and_action.action_specifics: CHANGE_ME Mid-strike moment, stone chips flying, focused intensity, visible effort
subject_and_action.pose_details: CHANGE_ME Right hand gripping stone hammer raised, left hand stabilizing stone on ground
subject_and_action.focal_point: CHANGE_ME Hands and tools in sharp focus, background soft

cinematography.shot_description: CHANGE_ME Tight framing on hands and immediate tool area
cinematography.camera_movement: CHANGE_ME Static with subtle handheld shake for organic realism

lens.depth_of_field: CHANGE_ME Shallow - hands sharp, background soft bokeh

cinematography.camera_angle: CHANGE_ME Slightly high angle, looking down at hands and stone

key_light.quality: CHANGE_ME Hard light with visible flicker

color_grading.grade_style: CHANGE_ME Desaturated earthy tones with selective warm fire accents

color_grading.saturation: Low overall (-30%), boosted +20% on fire/orange tones only

framing_guide.rule_of_thirds: CHANGE_ME Hands on right intersection point
framing_guide.negative_space: CHANGE_ME Camera-left for breathing room, dark cave background

depth_planes.foreground: CHANGE_ME Stone chips flying (subtle motion blur)
depth_planes.midground: CHANGE_ME Hands and stone tool (sharp focus)
depth_planes.background: CHANGE_ME Cave wall texture (soft, out of focus)

composition_and_framing.visual_balance: CHANGE_ME Asymmetric (hands right, negative space left)

vfx_and_motion.particle_effects: CHANGE_ME Stone chips/dust catching firelight as they fly
